title: Industry leading security
details: The operating system satisfies the latest hardware and software security requirements, keeping your customer transactions secure.

title: Contactless payment capabilities
details: Seamlessly enables contactless payments, providing you and the customer a safe payment experience.

title: Multiple payment options
details: Give customers the option to pay electronically using chip & PIN, magnetic stripe and contactless.

title: User-friendly and intuitive interface
details: Enables HTML5 web-based business apps through a large touchscreen display.
